description: Creates a new bridge. The request must include one source.

parameters.name: EgressGatewayBridge
parameters.description: An egress bridge is a cloud-to-ground bridge. The content comes from an existing MediaConnect flow and is delivered to your premises. The maximum expected bitrate (in bps) of the egress bridge.

nested_params.name: MaxBitrate
nested_params.description: The maximum expected bitrate (in bps) of the egress bridge.

parameters.name: IngressGatewayBridge
parameters.description: An ingress bridge is a ground-to-cloud bridge. The content originates at your premises and is delivered to the cloud. The maximum expected bitrate (in bps) of the ingress bridge. The maximum number of expected outputs on the ingress bridge.

nested_params.name: MaxBitrate
nested_params.description: The maximum expected bitrate (in bps) of the ingress bridge.

nested_params.name: MaxOutputs
nested_params.description: The maximum number of expected outputs on the ingress bridge.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the bridge. This name can not be modified after the bridge is created.

parameters.name: Outputs
parameters.description: The outputs that you want to add to this bridge. (dict) --- Add outputs to the specified bridge. NetworkOutput (dict) --- The network output of the bridge. A network output is delivered to your premises. The network output IP Address. The network output name. This name is used to reference the output and must be unique among outputs in this bridge. The network output's gateway network name. The network output port. The network output protocol. The network output TTL.

nested_params.name: NetworkOutput
nested_params.description: The network output of the bridge. A network output is delivered to your premises.

nested_params.name: IpAddress
nested_params.description: The network output IP Address.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The network output name. This name is used to reference the output and must be unique among outputs in this bridge.

nested_params.name: NetworkName
nested_params.description: The network output's gateway network name.

nested_params.name: Port
nested_params.description: The network output port.

nested_params.name: Protocol
nested_params.description: The network output protocol.

nested_params.name: Ttl
nested_params.description: The network output TTL.

parameters.name: PlacementArn
parameters.description: The bridge placement Amazon Resource Number (ARN).

parameters.name: SourceFailoverConfig
parameters.description: The settings for source failover. FailoverMode (string) --- The type of failover you choose for this flow. MERGE combines the source streams into a single stream, allowing graceful recovery from any single-source loss. FAILOVER allows switching between different streams. RecoveryWindow (integer) --- Search window time to look for dash-7 packets. SourcePriority (dict) --- The priority you want to assign to a source. You can have a primary stream and a backup stream or two equally prioritized streams. PrimarySource (string) --- The name of the source you choose as the primary source for this flow. State (string) --- The state of source failover on the flow. If the state is inactive, the flow can have only one source. If the state is active, the flow can have one or two sources.

nested_params.name: FailoverMode
nested_params.description: The type of failover you choose for this flow. MERGE combines the source streams into a single stream, allowing graceful recovery from any single-source loss. FAILOVER allows switching between different streams.

nested_params.name: RecoveryWindow
nested_params.description: Search window time to look for dash-7 packets.

nested_params.name: SourcePriority
nested_params.description: The priority you want to assign to a source. You can have a primary stream and a backup stream or two equally prioritized streams.

nested_params.name: PrimarySource
nested_params.description: The name of the source you choose as the primary source for this flow.

nested_params.name: State
nested_params.description: The state of source failover on the flow. If the state is inactive, the flow can have only one source. If the state is active, the flow can have one or two sources.

parameters.name: Sources
parameters.description: The sources that you want to add to this bridge. (dict) --- Add an output to a bridge. FlowSource (dict) --- The source of the flow. The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the flow to use as a source of this bridge. FlowVpcInterfaceAttachment (dict) --- The name of the VPC interface attachment to use for this source. VpcInterfaceName (string) --- The name of the VPC interface to use for this resource. The name of the flow source. This name is used to reference the source and must be unique among sources in this bridge. NetworkSource (dict) --- The source of the network. The network source multicast IP. MulticastSourceSettings (dict) --- The settings related to the multicast source. MulticastSourceIp (string) --- The IP address of the source for source-specific multicast (SSM). The name of the network source. The network source's gateway network name. The network source port. The network source protocol.

nested_params.name: FlowSource
nested_params.description: The source of the flow.

nested_params.name: FlowArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the flow to use as a source of this bridge.

nested_params.name: FlowVpcInterfaceAttachment
nested_params.description: The name of the VPC interface attachment to use for this source.

nested_params.name: VpcInterfaceName
nested_params.description: The name of the VPC interface to use for this resource.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the flow source. This name is used to reference the source and must be unique among sources in this bridge.

nested_params.name: NetworkSource
nested_params.description: The source of the network.

nested_params.name: MulticastIp
nested_params.description: The network source multicast IP.

nested_params.name: MulticastSourceSettings
nested_params.description: The settings related to the multicast source.

nested_params.name: MulticastSourceIp
nested_params.description: The IP address of the source for source-specific multicast (SSM).

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the network source. This name is used to reference the source and must be unique among sources in this bridge.

nested_params.name: NetworkName
nested_params.description: The network source's gateway network name.

nested_params.name: Port
nested_params.description: The network source port.

nested_params.name: Protocol
nested_params.description: The network source protocol.

nested_items.name: BridgeArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the bridge.

nested_items.description: Messages with details about the bridge.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The specific error message that MediaConnect returns to help you understand the reason that the request did not succeed.

nested_items.name: ResourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource.

nested_items.name: BridgeState
nested_items.description: The state of the bridge.
